mentalStages.description: Your power is completely uncontrolled. Every use hurts you more than your enemies.

Real progress! Your mind is sharpening. The energy listens to you.
Your power is solid now. You feel confident using it in combat.
Improvement is steady. The energy flows smoothly through your mind.
You are good at this. Control is almost second nature.
You are a true psychic now. Minds bend to your will.

Mastery grows. Your presence alone intimidates weaker minds.
